alert.note: Alert for Dickens; Kent (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 10:17PM CDT until June 21 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1045 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN KENT AND SOUTH CENTRAL DICKENS COUNTIES... At 1016 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Spur, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...West Texas Mesonet. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Clairemont. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for northwestern Texas. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
